title: DJ Sona Release Price?
body: Just wondering because Pulsefire Ezreal was 1650 on release, whereas Spirit Guard Udyr was 1820. Im guessing 1820 again, but just trying to get some clarification

replies.body: Pretty sure sale price is 1950 rp not 1820 but ya
Yeah maybe, something like that. Its been a while so im not 100% sure of everything

The skin is 3250 RP normally
Not sure about the sale price. Guessing it'll be half that.
probably full price or they would've mentioned a release sale price
They haven't even mentioned the release date for the skin itself.
